title: Is the Pocket Passing Quarterback still Viable?
text:
Over the last few years the NFL has seen the rise of mobile quarterbacks.
I hope this works, please tell me it works. pleaseeee

softball <- read_csv("https://mattwaite.github.io/sportsdatafiles/ncaa_womens_softball_teams_2024.csv")

Code
big10 <- softball |> 
  filter(
    conference == "Big Ten"
  )

ggplot() + geom_bar(data=big10, aes(x=team))
